item.description:
New to town and want to have fun for an evening of mixed doubles Round Robin?

It's a fun way to meet lots of new players on 8 indoor courts. Round robin format, change every thirty minutes. Munchables/ appetizers are served for the first 2 hours followed by a buffet supper.  Cash bar.   

Note- Tennis whites preferred but, not mandatory.  

Not for beginners. Tennis players must be 3.0, 3.5 or 4.0 players. 

            Limit of 32 tennis players- sign up asap. 

To register:

* Call 781-890-4285 (The Weston Racquet Club) after 6 p.m. Ask for Marlene, the Social Director. You must leave a credit card number with Marlene to hold your reservation. Payment will be at the door when you arrive either by putting it on that credit card or you can pay cash. No charges will be placed on your card unless you wish to pay ON YOUR CARD the $26.00 when arriving.   PaylPal is NOT accepted for this event.

DEADLINE TO SIGN UP: WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 1st.

 

Questions?

Email Michael Baer at soldieradoptmike@yahoo.com
item.name: Tennis anyone?
